edu.umd.cs.guitar.event

Class GThreadEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.guitar.event.GThreadEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GEvent

    public abstract class GThreadEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements GEvent
    Abstract class for all GUITAR events requiring to run in a separate thread. All subclasses must implement the actionPerformImp methods.

    Author:
    Bao Nguyen
